Take Vasara Chen's famous flaming combo and turn it into your own.\n\n<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font> Hold down the skill key to attack up to <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> times.
The first attack deals <font color='#00aaef'>983%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> times; press a directional key to move <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> m.
The second attack deals <font color='#00aaef'>741%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>2</font> times; press a directional key to move <font color='#00aaef'>3</font> m.
The third attack deals <font color='#00aaef'>350%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>10</font> times and <font color='#00aaef'>1704%</font> damage <font color='#00aaef'>1</font> time.
Grants knockback immunity.
